start.text: You've woken up on a boat, what do you do?

boat_fire.text: The boat is on fire, bad one. What next?

choices.text: head to the galley for a snack

snack.text: You head down to the galley for a snack, but the galley is on fire and now you're trapped.

overboard.text: You're overboard - there are sharks, and things aren't looking good

captain.text: You've become captain. Well Done! Where do you want to sail to?

north.text: It's way too cold here - you hit an iceberg and your boat explodes. No treasure for you

south.text: After two hours you reach an island, the island is full of treasure, you've won
